dropArea.message: Drop Spine files or folders here (JSON, Atlas, and Images)

interpretation.excellent: Suitable for all platforms and continuous animations
interpretation.good: Works well on most platforms but may have issues on low-end devices
interpretation.moderate: May cause performance dips, especially with multiple instances
interpretation.poor: Performance issues likely on most devices

tips.reduceBoneDepth: Reduce bone hierarchy depth by flattening the structure where possible.
tips.reduceBoneCount: Consider reducing the total number of bones by simplifying the skeleton.
tips.reduceVertices: Reduce the total number of vertices across all meshes.
tips.minimizeDeformedMeshes: Minimize the number of deformed meshes, especially those with high vertex counts.
tips.reduceWeightedMeshes: Reduce the number of meshes with bone weights, as they require more calculations.
tips.limitClippingMasks: Limit the number of clipping masks as they significantly impact performance.
tips.simplifyComplexMasks: Simplify complex clipping masks to use fewer vertices (4 or less is optimal).
tips.reduceBlendModes: Reduce the number of non-normal blend modes to minimize render state changes.
tips.minimizeAdditiveBlends: Minimize the use of additive blend modes as they are particularly expensive.
tips.reducePhysicsConstraints: Physics constraints are particularly expensive - consider reducing their number or complexity.
tips.simplifyIkConstraints: Simplify IK constraints by reducing chain length or number of affected bones.
tips.optimizePathConstraints: Optimize path constraints by simplifying paths or reducing the number of constrained bones.

drawer.name: Name
drawer.noEvents: No events found in this animation

warning.spine41Warning: Warning: This file uses Spine 4.1. The benchmark is designed for Spine 4.2. Version will be adjusted automatically.
